title: Per capita consumption of chewing gum in selected countries worldwide 2009 to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index value in the y axis.
The Index value is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
Country United States has 15.2 times more Index value than Country India which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index value is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Index value in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index value for 11 number of Countrys.
The maximum Index value 152.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at India where Country is 10.0.
The second highest Index value is appeared to be the Country Austria.
The difference of Index value between the highest and lowest Country is 142.0.
The Country United States has the highest Index value, followed by Austria, and Belgium. Down to the Country India which is the lowest.
The lowest value 10.0 at India is almost 1.77 times smaller than the average value 85.73.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 943.0.
